description: This week, we ring in 2014 by looking BACK at our favorite interviews of 2013.  (Because, yes, we’re punk like that.)  You’ll hear “things you didn’t know” from Daniel Radcliffe, Margaret Atwood, and many more… Sounds big and small from reggae legend Jimmy Cliff and They Might be Giants… Writer Elizabeth Gilbert (Eat, Pray, Love) […]
teaser: This week, we ring in 2014 by looking BACK at our favorite interviews of 2013.  (Because, yes, we’re punk like that.)  You’ll hear “things you didn’t know” from Daniel Radcliffe, Margaret Atwood, and many more… Sounds big and small from reggae legend Jimmy Cliff and They Might be Giants… Writer Elizabeth Gilbert (Eat, Pray, Love) […]
contentencoded: This week, we ring in 2014 by looking BACK at our favorite interviews of 2013.  (Because, yes, we’re punk like that.)  You’ll hear “things you didn’t know” from Daniel Radcliffe, Margaret Atwood, and many more… Sounds big and small from reggae legend Jimmy Cliff and They Might be Giants… Writer Elizabeth Gilbert (Eat, Pray, Love) sets the planets spinning… Tim Gunn and Lars Ulrich take the etiquette chair… Comedian Nick Kroll (attempts to) atone for Octoberfest… The year in Small Talk… “Gatsby” ringleader Baz Luhrmann kicks of our party… A liquid bikini… and lots more.

This week, we ring in 2014 by looking BACK at our favorite interviews of 2013.  (Because, yes, we’re punk like that.)  You’ll hear “things you didn’t know” from Daniel Radcliffe, Margaret Atwood, and many more… Sounds big and small from reggae legend Jimmy Cliff and They Might be Giants… Writer Elizabeth Gilbert (Eat, Pray, Love) sets the planets spinning… Tim Gunn and Lars Ulrich take the etiquette chair… Comedian Nick Kroll (attempts to) atone for Octoberfest… The year in Small Talk… “Gatsby” ringleader Baz Luhrmann kicks of our party… A liquid bikini… and lots more.

","type":"text/html"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"}]
title: Episode 234: Best of 2013
